heading: Today
text: Morning snow showers north of I-89 ending, some afternoon sun. Partly sunny in the Champlain Valley and south.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Partly cloudy south. More clouds, maybe a flurry north.

heading: Thursday
text: Clouds north, increasing afternoon sun. Becoming mostly sunny south.

heading: Friday
text: Sun giving way to increasing clouds. Snow in NY late.
